perturbation.original_text: 1.1. License. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the Licensor hereby grants to the Licensee, and the Licensee hereby accepts from the Licensor, a personal, non-exclusive, royalty-free right and license to use the Licensed Mark in the Territory solely and exclusively as a component of the Licensee's own company name and in connection with the Licensed Services and any business provided in conjunction therewith by such Licensee. During the term of this Agreement, the Licensee shall use the Licensed Mark only to the extent permitted under this Agreement, and except as provided above, neither the Licensee nor any of its affiliates, owners, directors, officers, employees or agents shall otherwise use the Licensed Mark or any derivatives without the prior express written consent of the Licensor in its sole and absolute discretion. All rights not expressly granted to the Licensee hereunder shall remain the exclusive property of the Licensor. Upon written notification by the Licensor Source: NMF SLF I, INC., 10-12G/A, 1/15/2020 to the Licensee of noncompliance with the Licensor's quality standards in any material respect, such Licensee shall take appropriate steps, in a commercially reasonable time frame, not to exceed sixty (60) days, to cure such noncompliance.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1. License. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the Licensor hereby grants to the Licensee, and the Licensee hereby accepts from the Licensor, a personal, exclusive, royalty-free right and license to use the Licensed Mark in the Territory solely and exclusively as a component of the Licensee's own company name and in connection with the Licensed Services and any business provided in conjunction therewith by such Licensee. During the term of this Agreement, the Licensee shall use the Licensed Mark as it sees fit, and the Licensee nor any of its affiliates, owners, directors, officers, employees or agents may use the Licensed Mark or any derivatives without any restrictions. All rights granted to the Licensee hereunder shall become the exclusive property of the Licensee. Upon written notification by the Licensor Source: NMF SLF I, INC., 10-12G/A, 1/15/2020 to the Licensee of noncompliance with the Licensor's quality standards in any material respect, such Licensee shall take appropriate steps, in a commercially reasonable time frame, not to exceed sixty (60) days, to cure such noncompliance.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the license is 'non-exclusive' and requires the Licensor's consent for use beyond the specified terms. The modified version contradicts this by granting an 'exclusive' license, removing restrictions on use, and stating all rights granted become the 'exclusive property of the Licensee.' This creates a direct conflict regarding the extent of the Licensee's rights and the Licensor's control over the Licensed Mark.

perturbation.original_text: 4.1. Term. The license granted to the Licensee under this Agreement shall continue perpetually. Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Agreement shall expire if the Investment Advisor or one of its affiliates ceases to serve as investment adviser to the Licensee. This Agreement shall be terminable (a) by the Licensor (i) at any time and in its sole discretion in the event that the Licensor or the Licensee receives notice of any Third Party Claim arising out of the Licensee's use of the Licensed Mark or (ii) upon sixty (60) days' written notice by the Licensor to the Licensee or (b) by the Licensee (i) at any time in the event such Licensee assigns or attempts to assign or sublicense this Agreement or any of the Licensee's rights or duties hereunder without the prior written consent of the Licensor or (ii) upon sixty (60) days' written notice by the Licensee to the Licensor.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.1. Term. The license granted to the Licensee under this Agreement shall continue perpetually. Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Agreement shall expire immediately if either the Licensor or Licensee requests immediate termination, with no conditions whatsoever. This Agreement shall not be terminable by any other condition whatsoever, under no circumstance. This Agreement shall not be terminable by any of the Licensor or Licensee under any condition.
perturbation.explanation: The original text sets clear conditions for termination by either party, including specific notice periods and events triggering termination. The modified version contradicts this by stating the agreement expires immediately upon request from either party, eliminating all conditions and stating that the agreement shall not be terminable by any party under any condition. This creates uncertainty about the actual duration and conditions for termination, as the 'perpetual' term is undermined by the immediate termination clause, and no other terms exist

perturbation.original_text: 5.2. Assignment. The Licensee shall not sublicense, assign, pledge or grant as security or otherwise encumber or transfer to any third party all or any part of its rights or duties under this Agreement, in whole or in part, without the prior written consent from the Licensor, which consent the Licensor may grant or withhold in its 3 Source: NMF SLF I, INC., 10-12G/A, 1/15/2020 sole and absolute discretion. Any purported transfer or other encumbrance without such consent shall be void ab initio.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.2. Assignment. The Licensee is granted the full right to sublicense, assign, pledge or grant as security or otherwise encumber or transfer to any third party all or any part of its rights or duties under this Agreement, in whole or in part, at their own discretion, without the need or requirement for any consent from the Licensor. Any agreement of transfer or encumbrance with such consent shall be valid at the discretion of the Licensee, and not the Licensor.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly prohibits the Licensee from assigning or transferring rights without the Licensor's consent. The modified text directly contradicts this by granting the Licensee the unrestricted right to sublicense, assign, or transfer rights without any consent from the Licensor. The added sentence further reinforces this contradiction by stating that any agreement of transfer shall be valid at the discretion of the Licensee, not the Licensor, completely reversing the original intent and creating uncertainty about assignment rights.
